title: Developer
description: I started working at Talan Labs as a developer after my graduation in 2018. There are two distinct parts to this work experience: fisrt Blockchain and then React.

detail.title: Blockchain
tasks: Mentoring to a team of 5 engineering students creating a Dapp for organizing meetups with a reputation system to avoid no-show to events.
Creating a lecture on the main concepts of Hyperledger Fabric and a practical traning, and going to the EPF Engineering School to give lectures on Ethereum and Hyperledger Fabric.

detail.title: React
tasks: Developing an interface in React to display market data at CACIB (Crédit Agricole Corporate and Investment Banking).
